column4: is there a command I can use to edit a certain line number in a text file?
editors usually have special commands to go to a certain line number
on the console, you can use the editor `vim`, then press : and enter a number to go to that line, then edit it like you normally do in vim (hint: press i, make changes, escape)
if you're automating, look at what Jack_Sparrow said - that's the way to go
